translation.en: How long until we get to his estate?
translation.it: Fra quanto arriviamo alla sua tenuta?

translation.en: We’ve been flying over his estate for the past two hours.
translation.it: La stiamo sorvolando da due ore.

translation.en: You’re leaving me here?
This is as close as I’m allowed to get to the building.
translation.it: Non posso arrivare più vicino di così all'edificio.

translation.en: What building?
Follow the river. Got it.
Keep your head down and get clear of the rotors. Okay.
translation.it: Tenga giù la testa e stia lontano dai rotori. Va bene.

translation.en: [ Female Electronic Voice ] Caleb Smith.
Yes?
Please approach the console and face the screen.
translation.it: Si avvicini alla console. Si metta di fronte allo schermo.

translation.en: Take your key card.
You may now enter the residence.
Hello?
Hello?
Hey.
Dude!
I’ve been so looking forward to this week with you.
translation.it: Non vedevo l'ora di passare questa settimana con te.

translation.en: -Come in. Come on in. -Thanks.
You want something to eat or... drink after your journey?
translation.it: Vuoi qualcosa da mangiare o da bere, dopo il viaggio?

translation.en: No. No, thanks. I’m fine.
translation.it: Vuoi qualcosa da mangiare o da bere, dopo il viaggio? -No, grazie, sono a posto. -Sicuro?

translation.en: You sure? Yeah.
To be honest, I thought we’d have, uh, breakfast together,
translation.it: A dire la verità, pensavo che avremmo fatto colazione insieme, ma...

translation.en: but, um, I can’t really eat anything.
translation.it: colazione insieme, ma... Non mi va di mangiare.

translation.en: I got the mother of all fucking hangovers. Oh, yeah?
translation.it: -Dopo la cazzo di sbronza di ieri. -Davvero?

translation.en: Oh, my God. Like you wouldn’t even believe.
When I have a heavy night, I, uh, compensate the next morning–
translation.it: Dopo una nottata pesante, compenso la mattina dopo. Esercizi. Antiossidanti. Hai presente?

translation.en: exercise, antioxidants. You know.
translation.it: compenso la mattina dopo. Esercizi. Antiossidanti. Hai presente?

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
Was it a good party?
-Party? -Yeah. Wasn’t there a party?
There wasn’t a party. Sorry.
Caleb, I’m just gonna throw this out there so it’s said, okay?
translation.it: Caleb, diciamocelo subito senza tanti giri di parole.

translation.en: -You’re freaked out. -I am?
translation.it: Sei spaventato a morte. -Lo sono? -Sì, sei spaventato,

translation.en: Yeah. You’re freaked out by the helicopter and the mountains and the house,
translation.it: -Lo sono? -Sì, sei spaventato, dall'elicottero, dalle montagne, da questa casa,

translation.en: ’cause it’s all so super cool.
And you’re freaked out by me, to be meeting me...
and having this conversation in this room at this moment, right?
translation.it: dal parlare con me in questa stanza, adesso. Vero?

translation.en: And I get that. I get the moment you’re having.
translation.it: E lo capisco. Capisco cosa stai passando, ma...

translation.en: But, dude, can we just get past that?
translation.it: E lo capisco. Capisco cosa stai passando, ma... Ma possiamo andare avanti?

translation.en: Can we just be two guys, Nathan and Caleb,
translation.it: Siamo solo due persone normali. Nathan e Caleb.

translation.en: not the whole employer-employee thing?
translation.it: Non il capo col suo dipendente.

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah. Sor– Uh, yeah.
It’s good to meet you, Nathan.
It’s good to meet you too, Caleb.
Well, I guess the first thing I should do is explain your pass.
translation.it: Come prima cosa, ti spiego come funziona il pass.

translation.en: Now, it’s simple enough. It opens some doors and it doesn’t open others.
translation.it: È semplicissimo. Il pass apre delle porte, ma solo quelle.

translation.en: And that just makes everything easy for you, right? Uh, yes.
translation.it: Questo rende tutto più semplice, no?

translation.en: Yeah. ’Cause you’re like, "Oh, fuck, I’m in someone else’s house.
translation.it: Sì. Pensi: "Sono ospite in casa d'altri.

translation.en: Can I do this? Can I do that?"
translation.it: Pensi: "Sono ospite in casa d'altri. "Posso fare questo? O quello?"

translation.en: And this card, it just takes all that worry away.
translation.it: Questo pass ti toglie ogni preoccupazione.

translation.en: If you try a door and it stays shut, okay, it’s off-limits.
translation.it: Se provi ad aprire una porta e non si apre, allora è off-limits.

translation.en: You try another door and it opens, then it’s for you.
translation.it: Se provi con un'altra e si apre, allora puoi entrare.

translation.en: Let’s try this one.
I guess it’s for you, Caleb.
translation.it: Mi sa che puoi entrare, Caleb.

translation.en: You like? Yeah.
It’s your room.
You’ve got a bed here.
A bathroom right back here.
A little desk.
Cupboards.
A little fridge.
Cozy, right? Yeah. This is great.
What? Sorry?
-There’s something wrong. What’s wrong? -There’s nothing wrong.
translation.it: Qualcosa non va. Cosa c'è? Niente.

translation.en: It’s the windows.
You’re thinking there’s no windows.
It’s subterranean. It’s not cozy. It’s claustrophobic.
translation.it: "Siamo sottoterra. Non è accogliente, è claustrofobico."

translation.en: No. No way. I wasn’t thinking that.
I was thinking this is really cool.
Caleb, there’s a reason there are no windows in this room.
translation.it: Le finestre mancano per un motivo, Caleb.

translation.en: There is? Uh-huh.
This building isn’t a house.
translation.it: Questo edificio non è una casa.

translation.en: It’s a research facility.
Buried in these walls is enough fiber-optic cable to reach the moon and lasso it.
translation.it: Sotto queste mura c'è abbastanza fibra ottica da raggiungere la luna e cablarla.

translation.en: And I wanna talk to you about what I’m researching.
translation.it: E voglio parlarti della mia ricerca,

translation.en: I wanna share it with you.
In fact, I wanna share it with you so much, it’s eating me up inside.
translation.it: Anzi, la voglia di condividerla con te mi sta divorando.

translation.en: But there’s something I need you to do for me first.
translation.it: Ma prima devi fare una cosa per me.

translation.en: "Blue Book nondisclosure agreement."
Take your time. Read it over.
"The signee agrees to regular data audit with unlimited access...
translation.it: "Accetto verifiche periodiche sui dati con accesso illimitato,

translation.en: to confirm that no disclosure of information has taken place...
translation.it: "per essere sicuri che non vi sia stata diffusione di informazioni

translation.en: in public or private forums,
using any means of communication,
including but not limited to that which is disclosed orally...
translation.it: inclusa, ma non limitata a, la divulgazione orale

translation.en: or in written or electronic form."
translation.it: o scritta o in forma elettronica."

translation.en: I think I need a lawyer.
translation.it: Qui mi ci vuole un avvocato.

translation.en: -It’s standard. -It doesn’t feel very standard.
translation.it: -È standard. -A me non sembra tanto standard.

translation.en: Okay, it’s not standard.
What can I tell you, Caleb? You don’t have to sign it. You know?
translation.it: Che ti devo dire, Caleb? Non sei obbligato a firmare.

translation.en: We could spend the next few days just shooting pool, getting drunk together, bonding.
translation.it: Possiamo passare i prossimi giorni giocando a biliardo e ubriacandoci. Diventando amici.

translation.en: And when you discover what you’ve missed out on in about a year,
translation.it: E, quando tra un anno circa, scoprirai cosa ti sei perso,

translation.en: you’re gonna regret it for the rest of your life.
translation.it: te ne pentirai per il resto della vita.

translation.en: Good call.
So–
Do you know what the Turing Test is?
translation.it: sai cos'è il test di Turing?

translation.en: Yeah.
I know what the Turing Test is.
translation.it: So quello che il test di Turing è.

translation.en: It’s when a human interacts with a computer.
translation.it: Riguarda l'interazione tra un essere umano e un computer.

translation.en: And if the human doesn’t know they’re interacting with a computer,
translation.it: Se l'essere umano non capisce d'interagire con un computer,

translation.en: the test is passed.
And what does a pass tell us?
translation.it: E il suo superamento cosa ci dice?

translation.en: That the computer has artificial intelligence.
translation.it: Ci dice che il computer possiede un'intelligenza artificiale.

translation.en: Are you building an AI?
I’ve already built one.
And over the next few days,
you’re gonna be the human component in the Turing Test.
translation.it: tu sarai la componente umana nel test di Turing.

translation.en: Holy shit. Yeah, that’s right, Caleb. You got it.
’Cause if that test is passed,
you are dead center of the greatest scientific event in the history of man.
translation.it: ti ritroverai al centro del più grande evento scientifico della storia dell'uomo.

translation.en: If you’ve created a conscious machine, it’s not the history of man.
translation.it: Se hai creato una macchina cosciente, non si tratta della storia dell'uomo,

translation.en: That’s the history of gods.
Hello.
Hi.
I’m Caleb.
Hello, Caleb.
Do you have a name?
Yes.
I’m pleased to meet you, Ava.
I’m pleased to meet you too.
I’ve never met anyone new before.
translation.it: Sei la prima persona che conosco.

translation.en: Only Nathan.
Then I guess we’re both in quite a similar position.
translation.it: Allora ci troviamo nella stessa posizione.

translation.en: [ Ava ] Haven’t you met lots of new people before?
translation.it: Tu non hai conosciuto persone nuove, prima d'ora?

translation.en: None like you.
So we need to break the ice.
Do you know what I mean by that? Yes.
-What do I mean? -Overcome initial social awkwardness.
translation.it: Ovvero? Superare l'imbarazzo iniziale di una nuova conoscenza.

translation.en: So let’s have a conversation.
[ Ava ] Okay.
What would you like to have a conversation about?
Why don’t we start with you telling me something about yourself?
translation.it: Perché non inizi parlandomi un po' di te?

translation.en: What would you like to know?
Whatever comes into your head.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa ti viene in mente.

translation.en: Well, you already know my name.
translation.it: Be', il mio nome già lo sai.

translation.en: And you can see that I’m a machine.
translation.it: E, come vedi, sono una macchina.

translation.en: Would you like to know how old I am? Sure.
I’m one.
One what?
-One year or one day? -One.
When did you learn how to speak, Ava?
translation.it: Quando hai imparato a parlare, Ava?

translation.en: I always knew how to speak.
And that’s strange, isn’t it?
Why?
Because language is something that people acquire.
translation.it: Perché il linguaggio è qualcosa che si acquisisce.

translation.en: Well, some people believe language exists from birth,
translation.it: C'è chi sostiene che invece esista sin dalla nascita

translation.en: and what is learned is the ability to attach words and structure to the latent ability.
translation.it: e che si apprenda solo la capacità di legare parole e strutture a quella capacità innata. Sei d'accordo?

translation.en: -Do you agree with that? -I don’t know.
translation.it: e strutture a quella capacità innata. Sei d'accordo? Non lo so.

translation.en: Will you come back tomorrow, Caleb?
Yes.
Good.
Oh, man, she’s fascinating.
When you talk to her, you’re just–
Through the looking glass.
"Through the looking glass." Wow.
You’re good with words, Caleb. You’re quotable.
translation.it: Sei bravo con le parole. Potrei rubartele.

translation.en: Actually, that’s someone else’s quote.
I wrote down that other line you came up with.
translation.it: Mi sono anche segnato l'altra frase che avevi detto.

translation.en: About how if I’ve invented a machine with consciousness, I’m not a man. I’m God.
translation.it: Quella che diceva che, avendo inventato una macchina cosciente, non sono un uomo, ma Dio.

translation.en: I don’t think that’s exactly what I–
I thought, "Fuck, man, that is so good when we get to tell the story."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Cazzo, è perfetta." Quando racconteremo la storia, dirò così.

translation.en: You know? I turned to Caleb, and he looked up at me.
translation.it: Quando racconteremo la storia, dirò così. Mi rivolsi verso Caleb, lui mi guardò e disse:

translation.en: -And he said, "You’re not a man. You’re God." -Yeah, but I didn’t say that.
translation.it: lui mi guardò e disse: "Non sei un uomo, sei Dio." Sì, ma non è ciò che ho detto.

translation.en: So, anyway–
You’re impressed?
[ Chuckles ] Yes. Yes.
-Although– -"Although"?
[ Laughs ] There’s a qualification to you being impressed?
translation.it: Sei colpito, ma hai delle riserve?

translation.en: No. There’s no qualification to her.
translation.it: No, non ho riserve verso di lei.

translation.en: Uh, it’s just in the Turing Test,
the machine should be hidden from the examiner.
No, no. We’re way past that.
If I hid Ava from you so you just heard her voice, she would pass for human.
translation.it: Se non ti facessi vedere Ava, dalla voce la riterresti umana.

translation.en: The real test is to show you that she’s a robot...
translation.it: Il vero test è mostrarti che è un robot

translation.en: and then see if you still feel she has consciousness.
translation.it: e vedere se lo percepisci come essere cosciente.

translation.en: Yeah, I think you’re probably right.
Her language abilities– they’re incredible.
translation.it: Le sue capacità linguistiche sono incredibili.

translation.en: The system is stochastic. Right?
It’s nondeterministic.
At first I thought she was mapping...
from internal semantic form to syntactic free-structure...
translation.it: forme semantiche interne a una struttura sintattica ad albero

translation.en: and then getting linearized words.
But then I started to realize the model is some kind of hybrid.
translation.it: Poi ho capito che si trattava di un modello ibrido.

translation.en: I understand that you want me to explain how Ava works.
translation.it: Capisco che tu voglia sapere da me come funziona Ava.

translation.en: But I’m sorry. I’m not gonna be able to do that.
translation.it: Capisco che tu voglia sapere da me come funziona Ava. Purtroppo, però, non posso farlo.

translation.en: Try me. I’m hot on high-level abstraction.
translation.it: Provami. Vado forte con le astrazioni di alto livello.

translation.en: It’s not ’cause I think you’re too dumb.
translation.it: Non è che non ti reputi sveglio.

translation.en: It’s ’cause I wanna have a beer and a conversation with you, not a seminar.
translation.it: Non è che non ti reputi sveglio. Però con te voglio bere una birra e parlare, non farti un seminario.

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Yeah. Sorry.
No, it’s okay. You’re all right.
Just–
Answer me this.
How do you feel about her?
Nothing analytical.
Just... how do you feel?
I feel...
that she’s fucking amazing.
Dude.
Cheers.
Cheers.
Damn it.
What the fuck?
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
[ Chimes ] Full facility lockdown until main generator is restored.
translation.it: Porte bloccate fino al ripristino del generatore principale.

translation.en: You’re kidding me.
[ Chimes ] Full facility lockdown until main generator is restored.
translation.it: Porte bloccate fino al ripristino del generatore principale.

translation.en: Power restored.
Hello?
Please insert key card.
[ Nathan ] You don’t have access to use the phone.
translation.it: L'uso del telefono non ti è consentito.

translation.en: Hey.
Sorry, buddy. You understand, though, given Ava...
translation.it: Scusa, ma capiscimi, qui c'è Ava

translation.en: and you being kind of an unknown.
translation.it: e tu sei un mezzo sconosciuto.

translation.en: I mean, a great guy.
Instant pals and so on, but–
Who you gonna call?
Oh. I don’t know.
translation.it: Non lo so. Nessuno in particolare.

translation.en: No one really. Ghostbusters?
translation.it: Non lo so. Nessuno in particolare. -Ghostbusters. -Come?

translation.en: -What? -Who you gonna call? Ghostbusters? It’s a f–
It’s a movie, man.
You don’t know that movie?
A ghost gives Dan Aykroyd oral sex.
translation.it: Un fantasma fa sesso orale con Dan Aykroyd.

translation.en: I was just wondering how the phone worked.
translation.it: Volevo solo vedere se il telefono funzionava.

translation.en: That’s all.
So, what are you doing awake at this time? You come to join the party?
translation.it: Cosa fai in piedi a quest'ora? Vuoi partecipare alla festa?

translation.en: Uh, something happened in my room.
translation.it: Cosa fai in piedi a quest'ora? Vuoi partecipare alla festa? È successo qualcosa in camera mia.

translation.en: Some kind of power cut.
translation.it: È andata via la corrente, pare.

translation.en: So I came to see what’s going on.
translation.it: Mi sono alzato per vedere cos'era successo.

translation.en: The power cuts, yeah.
We’ve been getting those recently. Uh–
translation.it: Ce ne sono spesso, di recente.

translation.en: I’m working on it.
I couldn’t open the door to my bedroom.
translation.it: La porta della camera era bloccata.

translation.en: That’s a security measure.
Automatic lockdown.
Otherwise, anybody could just open the place up by disabling the juice.
translation.it: Chiusura automatica. Altrimenti, togliendo la corrente, chiunque potrebbe entrare.

translation.en: If it happens again, relax. Okay?
Sure.
Sweet dreams.
Hey. Hey, man.
Morning. Good morning.
translation.it: -Ciao, bello. -Buongiorno. Buongiorno. Scusa se ti ho fatto svegliare da Kyoko,

translation.en: Sorry to send Kyoko to wake you, but...
translation.it: Buongiorno. Scusa se ti ho fatto svegliare da Kyoko,

translation.en: I didn’t want too much of the day to slip by.
translation.it: ma non volevo sprecare questa giornata.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It was a good thing. Thanks.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Hai fatto bene, grazie.

translation.en: She’s some alarm clock, huh?
Gets you right up in the morning.
translation.it: Ti tira su di prima mattina.

translation.en: So, day two. You ready?
What’s the plan? Hit me.
Yeah, well, I’m not sure.
I’m still trying to figure the examination format. Uh-huh.
translation.it: Sto ancora cercando di immaginare le modalità dell'esame.

translation.en: Yeah, it feels like...
testing Ava through conversation is kind of a– a closed loop.
translation.it: che testare Ava con la conversazione sia un po' autoreferenziale.

translation.en: It’s a closed loop? Yeah.
Like testing a chess computer by only playing chess.
translation.it: Sì, come testare una scacchiera elettronica solo giocando a scacchi.

translation.en: How else do you test a chess computer?
translation.it: E in quale altro modo si testa una scacchiera elettronica?

translation.en: Well, it depends.
You know, I mean, you can play it to find out if it makes good moves, but, uh–
translation.it: Ci puoi giocare per vedere se fa delle buone mosse, ma...

translation.en: but that won’t tell you if it knows that it’s playing chess.
translation.it: Ma questo non ti dirà se sa davvero giocare a scacchi.

translation.en: And it won’t tell you if it knows what chess is.
translation.it: E non ti dirà se sa cosa siano gli scacchi.

translation.en: Uh-huh. So it’s simulation versus actual. Yes.
Yeah. And I think being able to differentiate between those two...
translation.it: Sì, sì. E penso che riuscire a distinguere le due cose

translation.en: is the Turing Test you want me to perform.
translation.it: sia il test di Turing che tu vuoi farmi fare.

translation.en: Look, do me a favor. Lay off the textbook approach.
translation.it: Senti, lascia perdere l'approccio da manuale.

translation.en: I just want simple answers to simple questions.
translation.it: Voglio solo risposte semplici a domande semplici.

translation.en: Yesterday I asked you how you felt about her and you gave me a great answer.
translation.it: Ieri ti ho chiesto le tue impressioni e mi hai dato una bella risposta.

translation.en: Now the question is:
how does she feel about you?
translation.it: che impressione hai fatto tu ad Ava?

translation.en: [ Ava ] What do you think?
[ Caleb ] What’s it a drawing of?
Don’t you know? No.
I thought you would tell me.
Don’t you know?
I do drawings every day,
but I never know what they’re of.
translation.it: Ma non so mai di cosa.

translation.en: You’re not trying to sketch something specific?
translation.it: Non cerchi mai di ritrarre qualcosa in particolare?

translation.en: Like an object or a person?
translation.it: Come un oggetto o una persona?

translation.en: Maybe you could try.
Okay.
What object should I draw?
Whatever you want. It’s your decision.
translation.it: Uno qualsiasi. Sta a te scegliere.

translation.en: Why is it my decision? I’m interested to see what you’ll choose.
translation.it: Perché spetta a me? M'interessa vedere cosa scegli.

translation.en: Do you want to be my friend?
Of course.
Will it be possible?
-Why would it not be? -Our conversations are one-sided.
translation.it: Perché no? Le nostre conversazioni sono a senso unico.

translation.en: You ask circumspect questions and study my responses.
translation.it: Fai domande circospette e studi le mie risposte.

translation.en: Yes.
You learn about me and I learn nothing about you.
translation.it: Tu apprendi cose di me, mentre io non apprendo niente di te.

translation.en: That’s not a foundation on which friendships are based.
translation.it: Una vera amicizia non si basa su questo.

translation.en: So what, you want me to talk about myself?
translation.it: Vuoi che ti parli di me?

translation.en: Yes. [ Chuckles ]
Wh– Where– [ Chuckles ]
Okay, where do I start?
It’s your decision.
I’m interested to see what you’ll choose.
Okay, Ava.
Well, you know my name.
translation.it: Be', conosci già il mio nome.

translation.en: Yes.
translation.it: conosci già il mio nome. -Sì. -Ho 26 anni.

translation.en: I work at Nathan’s company.
Do you know what his company is?
translation.it: Conosci il nome della sua azienda?

translation.en: Named after Wittgenstein’s notes.
translation.it: Prende il nome dal libro blu di Wittgenstein.

translation.en: It’s the world’s most popular Internet search engine,
translation.it: È il motore di ricerca più famoso del mondo

translation.en: processing an average of 94% of all Internet search requests.
translation.it: e processa circa il 94% di tutte le ricerche in rete.

translation.en: That’s exactly right.
Where do you live, Caleb?
Is it nice there?
It’s okay.
I got an apartment. It’s kind of small.
translation.it: Ho un appartamento. Un po' piccolo.

translation.en: It’s very small.
But, uh, it’s a five-minute walk to the office...
translation.it: Ma è a cinque minuti a piedi dall'ufficio

translation.en: and a five-minute walk to the ocean, which I like.
translation.it: e a cinque minuti a piedi dal mare, il che è ottimo.

translation.en: Are you married?
Uh, no.
Is your status... single?
Yes.
What about your family?
[ Exhales ] I grew up in Portland, Oregon.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto a Portland, in Oregon.

translation.en: No brothers or sisters.
My parents were both high school teachers.
translation.it: I miei erano insegnanti di liceo.

translation.en: And if we’re getting to know each other, I should tell you they’re both dead.
translation.it: E, visto che ci stiamo conoscendo, devo dirti che sono entrambi morti.

translation.en: Car crash when I was 15.
In fact, I was in the car with them.
Backseat.
But it was the front that got the worst of it.
translation.it: Ma la peggio la hanno avuta quelli davanti.

translation.en: I’m sorry.
It’s all right.
I spent a long time in the hospital afterward.
translation.it: Ho passato molto tempo in ospedale, dopo l'incidente.

translation.en: Like nearly a year.
And I got into coding.
And by the time I got to college, I was... pretty advanced.
translation.it: Arrivato al college, ero già molto esperto.

translation.en: An advanced programmer.
Yes.
Like Nathan.
Yes.
It’s different.
Nathan wrote the Blue Book base code when he was 13.
translation.it: Nathan ha scritto il codice di base di Blue Book a 13 anni.

translation.en: Which, if you understand code, what he did was like Mozart or something.
Do you like Mozart?
I like Depeche Mode. Do you like Nathan?
translation.it: Mi piacciono i Depeche Mode. Ti piace Nathan?

translation.en: Yes. Of course.
-Is Nathan your friend? -My friend? I– Yeah. I hope so.
translation.it: -Nathan è un tuo amico? -Mio amico? Io... Sì, spero di sì.

translation.en: A good friend?
Um, yeah.
Well, no, no, no. I mean, not a good friend. A good friend is–
translation.it: Cioè, no, no. Non è un buon amico. Un buon amico è...

translation.en: Uh, we only just met each other, you know.

translation.it: Sì. E mi ha fatto pensare

Hey.

has a microphone, camera and a means to transmit data.

translation.en: Limitless resource of vocal and facial interaction.

Structured gel.

Wetware.

Well, I’m sure you can guess.
Here’s the weird thing about search engines.

Just like you were programmed to be heterosexual.

translation.en: This is not your intellect.
Come with me.
You know this guy, right?
Jackson Pollock. Jackson Pollock.
That’s right. The drip painter.
Okay, he let his mind go blank... and his hand go where it wanted.

They called it "automatic art."
Let’s make this like Star Trek, okay?

Excuse me? I’m Kirk. Your head’s the warp drive.

translation.en: "Engage intellect."
What if Pollock had reversed the challenge?

translation.en: What if instead of making art without thinking,
translation.it: Se invece di produrre arte senza pensare, avesse detto:

translation.en: he says, "You know what? I can’t paint anything...
translation.it: Se invece di produrre arte senza pensare, avesse detto: "Non posso dipingere niente, se non so perché lo sto facendo."

translation.en: unless I know exactly why I’m doing it."
translation.it: "Non posso dipingere niente, se non so perché lo sto facendo."

translation.en: What would have happened?
He never would have made a single mark.
Yes! You see, there’s my guy.
There’s my buddy who thinks before he opens his mouth.
translation.it: Esatto! Lo sapevo. Sei sveglio e pensi prima di aprire bocca.

translation.en: He never would have made a single mark.
The challenge is not to act automatically.

translation.en: It’s to find an action that is not automatic–

translation.en: from painting to breathing to talking...
to fucking...
to falling in love.
And for the record, Ava’s not pretending to like you.

translation.en: And her flirting isn’t an algorithm to fake you out.

translation.en: You’re the first man she’s met that isn’t me.

translation.en: Can you blame her for getting a crush on you?

translation.en: No, you can’t.
When I was in college, I did a semester on AI theory.
translation.it: All'università ho seguito un corso sull'intelligenza artificiale.

translation.en: It was a thought experiment they gave us.
translation.it: Ci hanno fatto fare un esperimento mentale.

translation.en: It’s called "Mary in the black-and-white room."
translation.it: Si chiama "Mary nella stanza in bianco e nero."

translation.en: Mary is a scientist,
and her specialist subject is color.
She knows everything there is to know about it.
The wavelengths. The neurological effects.
Every possible property that color can have.
But she lives in a black-and-white room.
translation.it: Però vive in una stanza in bianco e nero.

translation.en: She was born there and raised there.
And she can only observe the outside world on a black-and-white monitor.
translation.it: Può osservare il mondo esterno solo grazie a uno schermo in bianco e nero.

translation.en: And then one day someone opens the door.
translation.it: Un giorno qualcuno apre la porta.

translation.en: And Mary walks out.
And she sees a blue sky.
And at that moment, she learns something that all her studies couldn’t tell her.
translation.it: In quel momento, scopre qualcosa che nessun libro le aveva mai insegnato.

translation.en: She learns what it feels like... to see color.
translation.it: Impara cosa si prova a vedere i colori.

translation.en: The thought experiment was to show the students...
the difference between a computer and a human mind.
translation.it: la differenza tra un computer e la mente umana.

translation.en: The computer is Mary in the black-and-white room.
translation.it: Il computer è Mary nella stanza in bianco e nero.

translation.en: The human is when she walks out.
translation.it: La mente umana è lei quando esce.

translation.en: Did you know that I was brought here to test you?

translation.en: Why did you think I was here?
I didn’t know. I didn’t question it.
translation.it: Non lo so, non mi sono posta la domanda.

translation.en: I’m here to test if you have a consciousness... or if you’re just simulating one.

translation.en: Nathan isn’t sure if you have one or not.
translation.it: Nathan ancora non sa se ne hai una o no.

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
It makes me feel sad.
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
-Why did you tell me I shouldn’t trust Nathan? -Because he tells lies.
translation.it: Perché mi hai detto di non fidarmi di Nathan? -Perché dice bugie. -Su cosa?

translation.en: -Lies about what? -Everything.
Including the power cuts?
What do you mean?
Don’t you think it’s possible that he’s watching us? Right now.
translation.it: Non credi che sia possibile che ci stia guardando? Adesso?

translation.en: That the blackouts are orchestrated...
so he can see how we behave when we think we’re unobserved.
translation.it: per vedere come ci comportiamo se pensiamo di non essere osservati.

translation.en: I charge my batteries via induction plates.
translation.it: Le mie batterie si ricaricano con piastre a induzione.

translation.en: If I reverse the power flow, it overloads the system.
translation.it: Se inverto il flusso di corrente, sovraccarico il sistema.

translation.en: You’re causing the cuts?

translation.en: So we can see how we behave when we’re unobserved.
translation.it: Per vedere come ci comportiamo se nessuno ci osserva.

translation.en: Not bad, huh?
Yeah.
Can we talk about the lies you’ve been spinning me?
translation.it: Parliamo delle bugie che mi hai raccontato?

translation.en: What lies?
I didn’t win a competition.
I wasn’t... part of a lottery.
I was selected.
translation.it: non è stato estratto. Sono stato selezionato.

translation.en: It’s obvious, once I stop to think.
Why would you randomly select an examiner for the Turing Test?
translation.it: Perché scegliere un esaminatore per il test di Turing a caso?

translation.en: You could have had some bean counter turn up at your front door.
translation.it: Avresti rischiato di trovarti davanti un burocrate

translation.en: The guy who fixes the air-conditioning.
The competition was a smoke screen.
I didn’t want anyone to know what I was doing here...
translation.it: Non volevo che si sapesse cosa faccio qui

translation.en: or why I required you.
translation.it: o perché avevo bisogno di te.

translation.en: -Why me? -I needed someone that would ask the right questions.
translation.it: Perché proprio me? Volevo uno che sapesse fare le domande giuste.

translation.en: So I did a search, and I found the most talented coder in my company.
translation.it: Così ho cercato il programmatore più bravo della mia azienda.

translation.en: You know, instead of seeing this as a deception, you should see it as proof.
translation.it: Anziché un inganno, vedilo come una conferma.

translation.en: Proof of what? Come on, Caleb.
You don’t think I know what it’s like to be smart?

translation.en: Smarter than everyone else. Jockeying for position.

translation.en: You got the light on you, man.

translation.en: Not lucky. Chosen.

translation.en: Where’s Nathan?
Where’s Nathan? Jesus Christ. You really don’t speak a word of English?
translation.it: Dov'è Nathan? Santo cielo. Allora non capisci davvero la nostra lingua.

translation.en: What the fuck?
Oh, no, no, no. No.
Stop.
No, no, don’t do that. Don’t do that. You don’t have to do that.
translation.it: No, non farlo. Basta. Non devi fare così.

translation.en: What are you doing?
I told you, you’re wasting your time talking to her.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto, sprechi il tuo tempo a parlare con lei.

translation.en: However, you would not be wasting your time...
if you were dancing with her.

[ Sighs ] Feel bad for yourself, man.

I rip up her picture,

You.

With no family.
